description: Joka Farm Resources focuses on waste management in the sugarcane industry, aiming to produce safe, healthy drinks for children. The initiative transforms sugarcane waste into valuable products like biofertilizers and animal feeds, promoting a circular economy. By collaborating with local farmers and juice processors, Joka Farm not only addresses waste disposal issues but also enhances soil health and agricultural productivity. The project exemplifies sustainability and innovation in food systems, benefiting both the environment and the community.
name: Joka Farm Resources
